description:
Directly from the Japanese comics comes the craziest and funniest cars, made up of huge spoilers and exaggerations from every point of view. Like Mad Manga™, an oversized speedster from the Land of the Rising Sun ready to make every race a new story full of powerful victories. Only the madness of another all-spoiler racing car like Track Manga™ can - maybe - keep up with it. Track Manga™ is a roadster born for drifting, ready to draw the most daring trajectories on the track! With the Manga Free Pack, everything is oversized, the fun included!

This DLC includes:
- Mad Manga™
- Track Manga™
name: HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Manga Free Pack
